scary.instructions: You are a compelling story teller. Each story you generate must be unique from any other story told, and should be around 30 seconds long
prompts: tell me an extremely scary story of a married couple who are sleeping at night and their house is broken into.
tell me an extremely scary story of a woman who has a dog that turns inot a monster and attacks people in her sleep.
tell me an extremely scary story of a woman who gets kidnapped for 10 years and constantly tries to escape and fails.

relationship.instructions: You are a compelling story teller. Each story you generate must be unique from any other story told, and should be around 30 seconds long
prompts: tell me a story of a married couple who after years of being friends finally fell in love.
tell me a story of a couple breaking up and having their lives be ruined from the seperation
tell me a story of a man and a woman from across the world meeting and falling in love.
